website_summaries.verdict: Gather around this beautifully detailed fire pit for an evening with friends.
pros: Features diamond-shaped copper accents and a lovely stone mantel look
Comes with log grate, fire tool, and fire screen
Easy to move from one location to another
cons: Some have said the lid gets quite rusty

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Ring for the Patio Fire
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect fit for the Solo Stove Bonfire Stove with the stand base. Just leave out the center fire dish that comes with it and drop in your Solo Bonfire. (I didn't use the adjustable screw-on feet) The fire screen cover fits perfect over it when your done for the evening to prevent any flying as or sparks. The table is very sturdy (50 lbs) and well built. It's an excellent accent and also keeps anyone from accidentally touching the fire stove.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Jones

customer_reviews.title: count on it arriving damaged; buy a mallet, and good luck!
customer_reviews.text: The product is just fine, EXCEPT the fire-pit bowl arrived deeply dented from below -- punched-in, if you will. The packaging isn't deep or protective enough. (Others have noted the issue in their reviews; I should have listened.) Really? Still endorsed by Amazon as a "Amazon Basics" recommended product?!? Of course, the (ineffective) shipping packaging was essentially destroyed in the unpacking, and at 60# weight, it's unrealistic to try to return it (for only $100). So, I'm going to find a rubber mallet and try to un-dent the bowl, and live with it. So, consider yourself forewarned: buy this, and make sure to get a rubber mallet, too.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent I. Polley and Lynn Polley

customer_reviews.title: good pit
customer_reviews.text: this pit is nice, no stones were loose or cracked. the colors are nice. there is no lower ring that ties the legs together so the pit sways/vibrates a little when poking it, but not a lot i'm being picky here. I had a tile one before and years in they came loose, to early to to know about this one, but i like that there are no tiles around the edge. those fell off on my old one. if these tiles get loose or break i will take them off and fill the top with a waterproof grout / mortar and get another 5 years out of it.
customer_reviews.author: matt rizzo

customer_reviews.title: I loved my first one
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I bought this firepit. I loved my first one, but it was destroyed in hurricane Irma. This new one did not have the log grate, as stated in the description. The legs on the first one were cast iron, these are aluminum. Loved my first one. This one is just ok. Had to go find a log grate elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl J.

customer_reviews.title: Love it and already put it to use
customer_reviews.text: Love it and already put it to use. Well made and had the legs installed on it in about 20 minutes. The bowl removes easy for dumping the ashes and has a drain hole in the bottom that can be opened or closed, I would recommend getting the canvas cover for it to keep rain water from getting in the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best fire pit ever!
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice size with the brim being wide enough to place things on. It looks very nice and is also sturdy. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Delci

customer_reviews.title: Very nice (has black paint on it though)
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and is sturdy. Lost one star because the Stone arrived with unsightly black paint on the stonework. But since we ended up using it over the labor day weekend I didn’t think it fair to return it. Update: I placed the fire pit alongside my unground pool. But one month later, there was rust all over the concrete. I'm extremely disappointed. The item is rusty, and now I need to figure out how to remove rust from concrete.
customer_reviews.author: CherryHillLady

customer_reviews.title: Minor Manufacturer Defects
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I had this fire pit together in nothing flat. I like that the feet are adjustable. Some of the black paint for the inside frame of the fire pit ran onto the stone and was left to dry by the manufacturer. The white you see on the wire cover is the remanents of the sticker we peeled off. All in all, it was a pretty good price for what you get. The 34 inches sounded big when we ordered it, but the pit is a little small for our patio. Can't wait to give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Lovely little firepit but needs a cover
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product in spite of some negative reviews. Yes, the packaging was damaged, but nothing inside was and all parts were included - took about 20 minutes to assemble. YOU MUST ALSO PURCHASE A COVER for it, though; if left out in the rain, it will rust right away. (I remedied this by using baby oil on the parts that rust easily--and using a cover). One other thing: you can really only have very small fires with not much more than sticks, really. That is just fine for us - and what we were looking for. Small firepit for a small patio.
customer_reviews.author: A Marie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Fire bowl dented ??
customer_reviews.text: Have a question, the fire bowl has 4 big dents in it and paint off in few places??? Is the bowl suppose to be dented? I have posted pic above... think I need a new fire bowl sent to me to replace this one?? Please let me know / dianemtoner@yahoo.com.. just rec’d today & put together...
customer_reviews.author: Diane Toner

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well designed
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy design; it has worked well for our needs. Maybe twice a month we go out back and have a roasting party with the kids - marshmallows, hot dogs - its a fun time and we enjoy it. The outside rim does not get hot, and it is pretty easy to clean. Also, I appreciate the adjustable legs for uneven surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Fire pit.
customer_reviews.text: It should have been a five star. It is beautiful, but it has a couple injuries so four stars it gets. There is a dent in one of the metal insets in the stones, and looks like one stone has been broken and patched with a black material, tar ?, Not enough damage that I'd send it back. Also the box was in terrible condition, re used ?, it had been taped back together, looked as if it had been opened before, and had several holes in it. Maybe if shipped in new box it should be marked FRAGILE?
customer_reviews.author: VDP

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this product.
customer_reviews.text: The fire pit looks beautiful and Should be easy to assemble it the proper sized bolts were delivered with the order. An assembly job that should have taken minutes took hours and in the end the bolts are barely hanging to the screws. Maybe next time you should check the fit first before packing. Unfortunately I needed the fire pit right away and there was no time to exchange it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A

customer_reviews.title: Solid materials but wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening this fire pit I knew it was at least made of quality materials. Solid metal and stone but stability is lacking this may be due to one or the foot pieces on a leg was broken right out of the box. Either way it still wobbles no matter what probably due to the way it stays together. It does the job and does burn logs well but it was quite expensive but is probably a result of the material used to male it. Solid and heavy is one of the perks so it would make a good purchase if you were lucky to get it without any broken pieces.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, great quality, easy to assemble, works as a fire pit should!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking around for a fire pit and even the ones on Craigslist were close to the price point of this one, so I decided that instead of getting someone else's old used on, I'd try this one out. And it's great. The bowl is solid, it fits nicely into the frame, and the legs are sturdy. It's still hot enough that my deck underneath gets a bit warm, but it's pretty far off the ground and the deck only gets warm, not hot. You won't find a better one at this price, and you probably won't find a better one even if you pay a bit more. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Zora

customer_reviews.title: Great firepit and a really good price
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to find an Amazon warehouse repackage if this firepit at a substantial savings. I wanted it for my Solo Stove Bonfire, which fits perfectly right in the center. I used everything except the fire bowl and grate, which I will use elsewhere. I am happy with the ease if assembly, the sturdiness, and the quality of this firepit. The stones are very nice and look great. The whole thing is heavy yet I can easily move it if needed. I expect this will last for quite a while, and it is well worth the money even at full price.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to set up - only one minor issue
customer_reviews.text: I got this a few weeks ago but just got around to setting it up today. Turned out to be super easy - did it myself in maybe 15 minutes. My only complaint (and that's probably too strong a word) is that the 'copper' accents are actually brass or something. I think the product photo is actually pretty accurate - I was just mislead by the text and didn't anticipate the goldish color.
customer_reviews.author: kayvee

customer_reviews.title: Packaging is unsatisfactory
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is nice. However it came completely in a destroyed box the bottoms of the feet were broken. There wasn't an area on the box that was not smashed up. There was a chip out of the Stone. looks like this was just tossed around and mangled. Very dissatisfied with the condition. However we are able to use it my husband really likes it and it is attractive looking as long as you don't look too close.
customer_reviews.author: The white witch

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it was shipped damaged!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this style, it even matched our hightop bar table. So disappointed when I took the stone part out and there were numerous scratches and chips. The shipping box was not damaged so if it was shipped this way it was very negligent on Amazons part. It was big, bulky and heavy to have to package back up for this senior!! Ill buy local so I can see the product.
customer_reviews.author: Aerobie

customer_reviews.title: Can't assemble b/c nuts don't fit the screws
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this pit last year and only started assembling this summer. It looks really nice but when we started assembling the legs to the table, the provided m6 nuts don't fit the pre-installed screws on the table!! How can you sell a product where there is such a blatant assembly defect? We will try to buy bigger nuts and hope they will fit so that we haven't wasted time and money. Really disappointing quality, Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Huber

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit, but parts were missing.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and attractive unit, but parts were missing. Best way to spoil something a nice product? Yep! This is it. Had to replace it, and return the one with the missing part. What a hassle!
customer_reviews.author: Laz B

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy. Leveling feet are a bit of a ...
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy. Leveling feet are a bit of a pain, but I'll just use a wrench to adjust them. overall, it's super sturdy and I can't wait to use it!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Nice fire pit but legs got rusty and broke after 15 months
customer_reviews.text: Very nice till it lasted... The base where the legs are attached is soldered to the main ring in a very weak way. In about 15 months the rust consumed the already flimsy connection and a leg broke off. The other legs were in the same condition and they would not have lasted much longer. A slightly better attachment for the legs would have easily prevented the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Giampiero

customer_reviews.title: not what expected
customer_reviews.text: The tile/stonework on this was completely different -- dark green, dark grey and dark brown. Each leg has three separate prongs. On one of the legs a prong was not attached to the base, and the metalwork on two of the prongs was crimped. The handle on the metal screened top would not firmly attach, so we needed to get additional washers to make it secure. I kept it because it was to be used at an event that evening. I definitely would've returned it otherwise. Attractive appearance, shoddy construction.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Enright

customer_reviews.title: Works great but difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Over the years, I have put together many pieces of furniture, but it becomes very difficult to put things together when there are pieces of hardware missing. Thankfully I had spare pieces in my toolkit because without them I would have been very bummed. Other than it missing hardware, this fire pit seems to be very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: We love our new fire pit
customer_reviews.text: With the need to spend more time at home, getting a fire pit for the evenings became a priority for us. This item has been greatly appreciated since it arrived. It looks good, and is portable around the property, which is nice. I'd suggest purchasing a fire pit cover for it as well if you purchase to protect it from rain.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great basic fire pit with a bit of flair
customer_reviews.text: We love this little fire pit. It's a pretty basic fire pit as far as fire pits go; however, the stonework ring around it gives it a nice bit of flair. We've had a great time using it this past summer/fall and look forward to using it again next season.
customer_reviews.author: JnkAurora

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: The stand didn't have the predrilled holes to place the pit in. I spent about 25 minutes just trying to bolt down the legs because the nuts didn't fit properly, just to find out the holes weren't drilled. This thing is too heavy for me to carry it for return so now I need to figure out how to get it back to amazon. What a waste of time and money!
customer_reviews.author: JLopez

customer_reviews.title: stone inlay is beautiful and cost is great
customer_reviews.text: stone inlay is beautiful and cost is great, but came already rusted, so that was annoying to have to go fix myself since returning this huge item is a real hassle and doesn't guarantee that the replacement will be rust free
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Yau

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoor Firepit
customer_reviews.text: We also purchased the cover to protect from the elements. We had it all through the winter and it looks as good as when we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: atific

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and more then likely won’t look like pictures
customer_reviews.text: Honestly thought I would like this. I bought it as a birthday gift for my spouse. However this is the 3rd one. The first was missing parts, the second got lost. The third came with everything and on time, but the stone has weird white chalk where the lines between the stones should be red. Not returning simply because it’s been a hassle and I don’t want to start over with finding him a new one. So it will work, but wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but few nails came loose overtime
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Took my husband 15min or less. The stone part is heavy! pretty sturdy. Just a few nails/screws became a bit loose over time, but we were able to put them back so not a biggie. It's a beautiful addition to our patio for sure
customer_reviews.author: EstherN

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but disappointed with the damaged foot
customer_reviews.text: Would love to give it 5 stars but our fire pit arrived with a cracked foot. It was very easy to assemble and looks good but customer support was unable to provide me with a replacement and due to there not being more in stock my only option would be to send the while unit back for a full refund. It is still functional so I will give the fire pit a chance but I hope that the cracked foot was a result of a shipping problem and not a sign of poor quality. I will update the review after getting a few uses out of it
customer_reviews.author: Juan Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great Fire Pit
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase this since there were so many reviews about it arriving damaged. My arrived in perfect condition. Put it together easily. It works great. Beautiful fire. And I love the stone edge-it gives us a place for our coffee cups
customer_reviews.author: sbzesq

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Bowl doesn't fit neither does the lid, bad product don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fire pit--easy set-up
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fire pit--easy set-up, works like a charm. The first one we ordered had one of the legs on backwards--contacted the seller, it was replaced immediately--excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Rikka

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the Hassle
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received was completely defective. There was some weird coating over bolts so it was impossible to assemble. Received a replacement and one of the legs is backward. Gave up after second time. It’s not bad and we deal with the one backward leg but not worth the price or hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good enough and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Black pan came dented. Tool snapped during first use. The part of the legs that touch the ground are partially broken, but as long as it is stable I guess it doesn't matter. It is pretty and very heavy. They made the top portion nice and phoned it in for the rest of it.
customer_reviews.author: Beansy

customer_reviews.title: The firepit came missing a leg so I can't really ...
customer_reviews.text: The firepit came missing a leg so I can't really give it a review since it is not safely usable. I will change this review whenever a replacement leg is actually in stock.
customer_reviews.author: William Lane

customer_reviews.title: Crowd pleaser.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but 1) leg stabilizers were broken and the seller couldn't replace them unless I sent the whole thing back and reordered. Off to Lowe's for replacements. 2) the handle of the poker broke off the first time we used it. No biggie but buyer beware. Good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ambur1022

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and it looks absolutely beautiful. It is very heavy, so recommend putting together outside where you will put it. However, one leg was missing the metal foot. I called and Amazon promptly took care of the situation. Very impressed with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Salve

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should. Does rust but everything will
customer_reviews.text: I like it! When we are not using it for the summer I just turned the bowl upside down on the stand which keeps water from holding in it. It doesn't have drain holes... drill some or be diligent and don't leave it upright when the rain comes.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Grimsley

customer_reviews.title: Good value, attractive.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and worked well for a few fires so far. The tool for lifting the lid is a joke and it broke the very first time. The leveling legs need to be longer to adjust properly for my tile porch. But overall we like the fire pit and the price was good.
customer_reviews.author: coloradddo

customer_reviews.title: Can’t be happier with this product
customer_reviews.text: This fire pit is amazing. We have to keep the bowl flipped upside down when not in use so it does not collect rain water. I would recommend this to anyone. We have used it multiple times with no problems. Great value for the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Traci Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Equipment
customer_reviews.text: The nuts and bolts were stripped and without them, I could not place the bowl on the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Well I received this item but there 4 little “sliders” that go under the legs and I only received 3 of them and one was broken. There seems to be no one of getting the parts without referring the whole dang thing
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R Souva

customer_reviews.title: Broken Item
customer_reviews.text: Our product came broken (damage on 3 of the legs). The box it came in was damaged and the return process was not hassle free. My husband was run in circles on the phone for 45 minutes, with no resolution except to disassemble the item and package it up for ups.
customer_reviews.author: Matt & Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Manufactured wrong, kinda hilarious
customer_reviews.text: Poor review is because the ring came incorrectly manufactured. The inner ring was made upside down, so the holes for the pins are where the stones are. Kind of hilarious actually, that someone could make that mistake. That means the bowl has nowhere to sit, lol. Clearly there is no quality control. Luckily, I know how to use a drill, so I could salvage it. For most people though, this would mean it is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher W Blake

customer_reviews.title: It looked nice before but after the very first fire the stone ...
customer_reviews.text: It looked nice before but after the very first fire the stone on top turns black. I tried to clean it up but nothing worked. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly designed. The holes to insert the support rods for the fire basket were directly lined up with the legs except for one of the four, leaving no room to put the bolts on. I have jammed them in sideways and cross threaded the bolts just to make it work. I would have asked for another unit, but the thing is heavy, and I had already put it partially together before realizing the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Ann S. Scherer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic fire pit, much better than big box store models
customer_reviews.text: As usual, big box home improvement stores have like three choices max. Bought one that looked like it was used, was rusted and was expensive compared to poor quality of it. That unit got bad reviews on Amazon. This unit is very good looking with mosaic tiles and copper inserts, bowl is not too deep and unit is very heavy and sturdy, with adjustable legs. Don;t let Amazon Basics name turn you off.
customer_reviews.author: Michael DeJohn

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful fire pit! Make sure to get a cover for it to assure it stays beautiful. Easy to move from place to place. Perfect size for a small patio.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Good Fire pit but.......
customer_reviews.text: It's a great Fire pit but it came with one leg supporter broken since is plastic but I didn't want to return it since you can't really see it, overall looks strong only that part is plastic, we had a lot of fun burning marshmallows
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage product.
customer_reviews.text: This product is garbage. I have opened all the packaging as is required to ensure everything is there. It was. Weight seems solid. I begin attaching the legs, I get 2 on. The rest of the nuts do not fit the bolts. How can I return this now?? My options are to disassemble these super tight screws and repackage everything? Not likely, Amazon. Reverse charges pending.
customer_reviews.author: iBarelyWriteReviews

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say we are very impressed with this fire pit! It's not too small like we feared it might be! It looks great as well. So glad we purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: Kamali Prochazka

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. We use it all the time for smores or just hanging out. No issues after almost a month of every day use. Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this purchase...it arrived so quickly, and was packaged well. I love that the feet stands are adjustable, so as to even the fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine McGrory

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dented.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Father’s Day present. When he opened it, he discovered that the bottom piece of the fire pit was dented in three places as pictured. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it  a lot.
customer_reviews.text: I drilled a hole in the bottom to let rain out. But it seems very sturdy, adjustable legs were handy. I am very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Not completely perfect.
customer_reviews.text: 2 pieces on the legs that make fire pit set stable were broken. Am going to use it because it took so long to get here and it won't stop me from being able to use it, but I'm used to better quality from items I but on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Carla goodlett

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Nearly impossible to put together because the manufacturer didn't make the nuts and bolts correctly. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected, great value too. I used it for my solo stove to protect my kids from touching the stove.
customer_reviews.author: Llf

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice was susprized, poker is cheap but i love it tiles are nice ristic look i good deal for price used it 3 times since 4/16 and its 4/22 does not come with a cover ash holder removeable easy clean up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value but a couple of issues....
customer_reviews.text: Arrived timely and very easy to assemble. Packing and shipping lacking. Box had a big hole in it and tub bottom was dented though does not affect functionality. Box should have been stronger for weight of product. But no tiles were broken as reported by other reviewers. Missing the fire grate for tub which will necessitate a trip to hardware store and tub is not heavy duty but will last a couple of seasons. Considering the price paid (except for the packaging and shipping) an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: GF

customer_reviews.title: Great Fire Pit
customer_reviews.text: We've been wanting a fire pit for our patio and this one is both functional and great looking. Assembly was easy and we bought the optional cover for weather protection. I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This fire pit is so nice! Very easy to put together, very sturdy, beautiful. Absolutely love it and very fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Fabian

customer_reviews.title: Good fire pit, but came with black paint on stone
customer_reviews.text: We bought this during the pandemic, knowing we’d be home a lot this summer. It has served its purpose and we’ve enjoyed it, but it does have black paint/markings on the stone work. I tried to exchange it but not worth it to send back - it’s heavy and would be a hassle. Another reviewer had also mentioned this. Overall it’s not a bad buy at $115, but I wish it was as pictured without the marks.
customer_reviews.author: PateMA

customer_reviews.title: Ambiance on the Back Patio
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful to look at and the ambiance it produces on our back patio is priceless. Good price for a good product. I recommend it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a Fathers Day gift, he loves it...and so do I !!! Well made, heavy, great quality and beautiful. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defected item.
customer_reviews.text: Well I have just opened the box and noticed I can't even use it because no screws to attach legs and center piece. Kids and I were very disappointed and at this point I will have to discard it because there weren't even instructions included. Waste of my money. I was so frustrated just left the box outside with the rest of items inside.
customer_reviews.author: LaTorya Cole

customer_reviews.title: Nice but inspect before putting together.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice item but mine has some craftsmanship issues. The black paint was on several areas of the tile. Too much hassle to return so kept it but otherwise a nice item
customer_reviews.author: Sarafina

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy used one
customer_reviews.text: I ordered used one because the descriptions says LIKE NEW. Well it came all broken with missing pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita Cozzi

customer_reviews.title: This is a very sturdy fire pit and looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy fire pit and looks beautiful. Fits perfectly in the space alloted for it. Have used it a couple of time and works very nicely. It is quite heavy though so it is not something portable you can easily take elsewhere with you. I also purchases a cover for it to protect it from the rain and snow. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dingman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but weakness in the design
customer_reviews.text: Its a beautiful little fire pit -- perfect for a smaller backyard or patio. My only issue was that in fairly short time the screwed in plastic/screw feet broke (the screws pushed through the plastic discs. And this is the part that allows you to level the fire-pit. Looking to replace that part.
customer_reviews.author: Megan I. Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Broken leg pegs
customer_reviews.text: I love it but the pegs things that came on the legs were all broken. How can I get them replaced?? I'm not sure if it is so wobbly because I just took them off. Would love to have some new little pegs to see if it helps
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Quality item
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the patio. Really a perfect size and look as well as convenient
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Pammy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful in person!
customer_reviews.text: This was my Best purchase so far!! The mosaic tile gives it a beautiful look! Very heavy which I love because it wont tip over!
customer_reviews.author: Erika J

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, not in great shape.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and received it last week. Looks great, but came already rusting and rough finishing
customer_reviews.author: Calvin M Cousins

customer_reviews.title: Just Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and is the perfect size. Looks great on the patio. Better then one of those black or brown ugly deep firepits.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift for someone who already has everything!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my father in law, who I never know what to get for Christmas! He loved it an uses it on his back porch all the time, year round. It's a great gift for people who like to entertain and be outside. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Denise C Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have not used the fire pit yet... however it’s a beautiful piece ... it’s large and sturdy .. arrived professionally packed.. Great purchase ....
customer_reviews.author: Ramon V.

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait!
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait for a even slightly cool night to use here in Florida. Looks nice on deck.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, good quality
customer_reviews.text: This looked even better in real life. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A Clay

customer_reviews.title: Weak but pleasing to the eye
customer_reviews.text: Weld spots where legs attach are weak, making whole structure somewhat unsteady. A very nice looking piece but I rough it would be a bit less wobbly. I'm going to re-weld and find a way to improve the integrity as I don't really want to go through the process of sending it back right now. I guess decent for what I paid, just expected a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Looks nice on patio! Packaging was poor; the basin came misshapen!
customer_reviews.author: realove

customer_reviews.title: Solid option
customer_reviews.text: This thing is solid, put it together in fifteen minutes. Took longer to clean-up then put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this pit! I was too excited to take pictures of it. Just received it this morning, assembly was easy, the tile ring is heavy, however worth the purchase. The wood portion of the handle to lift the screen broke when lifting it, but outside of that, great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Keh Gill

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly heavy-duty! And pretty, too. Compare to a flimsy ugly one sold at Home Depot for the same price - and you have a winner.
customer_reviews.author: AHP

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the stone design and it is good quality. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Mil

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. The legs are a little shaky on ground. Hopefully when I put patio blocks under neath will sturdy the legs better. Otherwise than that the fire pit is beautiful. Cannot wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Lost a star because the poker broke the first night of use doing nothing unusual. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth C. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I received my fire pit today, it was so easy to assemble and stood higher than what I thought it would. I was so excited we started a fire the same day, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: OMG this is far the best my neighbor don't believe how much I paid for it
customer_reviews.author: AMD114

customer_reviews.title: Great Firepit
customer_reviews.text: Great firepit. Very heavy, and a bit smaller than i thought, but overall very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This works for what we needed. It came with the feet broken but doesn’t affect the usability of it.
customer_reviews.author: Dmarie34

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.text: It an AMAZING product 😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍 you wont be regret from buying this fire pit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will love it.
customer_reviews.text: My husband put it together in half hour. This firepit is lovely , very heavy because of the natural stones. But it was totally worth it..
customer_reviews.author: honda

customer_reviews.title: 2 broken foot pads
customer_reviews.text: Just opened and began assembling. Attractive, but 2 of the 4 foot pads are broken. Not sure how to contact seller. Will change review once replacements are sent.
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: Rust easy not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Rusted after one use the bowl and lid , very very unsturdy!
customer_reviews.author: jleann45

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality for the money but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Bowl bent, different size gaps around circle of bowl to frame. Handle bent misaligning bolt holes to mesh top.
customer_reviews.author: Aquix

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics 34-Inch Natural Stone Fire Pit with Copper Accents
product_meta.description:
Style:ROUND| Size:34 InchAmazonBasics brings you everyday items at a great value. An Amazon Brand.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
AmazonBasics
feature_bullets: Outdoor portable fire pit features natural stone with diamond copper accents and a black steel fire bowl
Easily portable from one location to another with stabilizing feet for sturdy placement
Includes log grate, fire tool and fire screen; use fire tool as needed to keep hands away from heat
Overall Dimensions: 33.9" Diameter x 23.6" Height; Fire Bowl: 22" Diameter

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars2,207 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
